name: NTBSS: Master Character Training Pack - Sasuke Uchiha
summary:
A special training pack for your avatar!

Featured in this "Master Character Training Pack" is the one-and-only Sasuke Uchiha (Last Battle)!
Purchasing this DLC will make him available as a master at the Ninjutsu Library, ready to offer Ninjutsu training.

Train with Sasuke Uchiha (Last Battle) to acquire Training Points that can be used to unlock a variety of Ninjutsu, weapons, and costumes for your avatar!
